# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the toolbar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you assign a custom view to the toolbar item, modifying this property updates the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItem/title] property of the view if one exists. If the toolbar item contains a button, modifying this property updates the button title. If the item doesn’t contain a custom view, the toolbar item manages the content directly.



## Describing the item

- **possibleLabels**: The set of labels that the item might display.
- **label**: The label that appears for this item in the toolbar.
- **paletteLabel**: The label that appears when the toolbar item is in the customization palette.
- **toolTip**: The tooltip to display when someone hovers over the item in the toolbar.
